title: kAvAnO dinamE
sahitya:
kAvAnO dinamE kaDavuLunnai kai viDuvAnO manamE


anupallavi

  nAvArap-pOTriyE tEvAram pADiya nAyanmArkk-aruL sheida naTarAja durai unnaik-


caraNam    kaNNappan eccilum uNNamudenak-koNDAn kallum paDagAi appar karai sEravE kaNDAn
maNNuyir sezhittiDa viNNamudam surandAn mAtA pitAkkaLinum tAtAvena sirandAn
